name: Setting out tiles according to construction drawing / Site confirmation

Floor grinded or free from any latent, contaminants or cracks
Multiprime and A38 Slurry applied prior screeding as a bonding agent

PE Foam tape to all relevant substrate
Apply Ardex STB to all changes plane, penetration, and floor waste area
